ABOUT.TITLE: About me
ABOUT.INTRO: Hi, I'm Patrick Schmidt, currently undergoing further training at Developer Akademie to become a Fullstack Developer.
ABOUT.PASSION: I am passionate about building modern web applications and continuously expanding my skills in both frontend and backend technologies.
ABOUT.GOAL: My goal is to create impactful digital solutions and grow as a developer in a collaborative environment.
ABOUT.CONNECT: Let's connect and create something amazing together!
ABOUT.LEARNING: Enthusiastic about learning new technologies and continually improving my skills.
ABOUT.CHALLENGE: I enjoy tackling challenges and always strive for efficient, elegant solutions. My approach is analytical, creative, and collaborative.

SKILLS.TITLE: My skills
SKILLS.DESCRIPTION1: I am skilled in modern frontend technologies like HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and Angular, applying them effectively in projects. My focus is on clean code and intuitive user interfaces.
SKILLS.DESCRIPTION2: Continuous learning keeps my knowledge up to date, and I am open to new tools and frameworks to create innovative solutions.
SKILLS.LEARNING: I am motivated to learn new technologies and methods and apply them directly in practice.

PORTFOLIO.TITLE: Portfolio
PORTFOLIO.DESCRIPTION: Explore a selection of my work here – interact with projects to see my skills in action.

PROJECTS.POLLO_DESC: A jump, run, and throw game, based on vanilla JavaScript with object-oriented programming. Help Pepe through the Mexican desert, fight against chickens, and win the game.
PROJECTS.POKEDEX_DESC: A Pokédex based on the PokéAPI with various features. Choose between card view and arena view, all Pokémon come with their own sounds. Discover the world of Pokémon in my unique Pokédex.
PROJECTS.WINDOWS_DESC: A website that simulates Windows, featuring a file system, Wi-Fi, settings, browser, editor, code editor, terminal, games, and more.
PROJECTS.JOIN_DESC: Kanban Project Management Tool, with real-time updates, drag & drop, and secure Firebase authentication

HEINZE.TEXT: Whoever works with Patrick immediately notices his interest in programming. He tests, questions, and thus brings fresh input to every project.
HEINZE.AUTHOR: S. Heinze

LUZIUS.TEXT: Working with Patrick means experiencing logic in action. His exceptional understanding of structure and connections leads to clear, well-thought-out solutions even for complex tasks.
LUZIUS.AUTHOR: D. Luzius

WEBER.TEXT: Great team player who brings innovative solutions to complex challenges. Highly recommended!
WEBER.AUTHOR: S. Weber

FISCHER.TEXT: Professional, reliable, and always willing to go the extra mile. A pleasure to work with.
FISCHER.AUTHOR: M. Fischer

CONTACT.TITLE: Contact
CONTACT.SUBTITLE: Got a problem to solve?
CONTACT.DESCRIPTION: Feel free to get in touch—whether for a project, collaboration, or feedback. Together, we’ll find the right solution for your needs.
CONTACT.NAME: Your name
CONTACT.PRIVACY_AGREE: and agree to the processing of my data as outlined.
CONTACT.SUCCESS: ✓ Message sent successfully! I'll get back to you soon.
CONTACT.ERROR: ✗ Failed to send message. Please try again or email me directly.

PRIVACY.TITLE: Privacy Policy
PRIVACY.INTRO_TEXT: This privacy policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal data when you use our contact form.
PRIVACY.COLLECTION_TEXT: When you use our contact form, we collect the following data:
PRIVACY.PURPOSE_TEXT: We use your data exclusively to respond to your inquiry. The data will not be shared with third parties unless required by law.
PRIVACY.LEGAL_TEXT: The processing of your data is based on your consent (Art. 6(1)(a) GDPR) when submitting the contact form.
PRIVACY.STORAGE_TEXT: Your data will be stored until your inquiry has been fully processed and subsequently deleted, unless there are legal retention obligations.
PRIVACY.FORMSPREE_TEXT: We use Formspree to process our contact form. Formspree acts as our processor and processes your data according to their privacy policy. More information: https://formspree.io/legal/privacy-policy
PRIVACY.RIGHTS_TEXT: You have the following rights regarding your personal data:
PRIVACY.RIGHTS_ACCESS: Right to information about your stored data
PRIVACY.RIGHTS_CORRECTION: Right to correction of incorrect data
PRIVACY.RIGHTS_DELETION: Right to deletion of your data
PRIVACY.SECURITY_TEXT: We use technical and organizational security measures to protect your data from unauthorized access, loss, or misuse.
PRIVACY.CHANGES_TEXT: We reserve the right to update this privacy policy. The current version is always available on this page.
PRIVACY.CONTACT_TEXT: If you have questions about data protection, please contact us at: kontakt@patrick-schmidt.de

IMPRESSUM.TITLE: Legal Notice
IMPRESSUM.RESPONSIBLE_TEXT: Patrick Schmidt is responsible for the content of this website according to § 55 Abs. 2 RStV.
IMPRESSUM.DISCLAIMER_CONTENT_TEXT: As a service provider, we are responsible for our own content on these pages in accordance with general laws. However, we are not obliged to monitor transmitted or stored third-party information or to investigate circumstances that indicate illegal activity.
IMPRESSUM.DISCLAIMER_LINKS_TEXT: Our offer contains links to external websites of third parties, on whose contents we have no influence. Therefore, we cannot assume any liability for these external contents. The respective provider or operator of the pages is always responsible for the contents of the linked pages.
IMPRESSUM.COPYRIGHT_TEXT: The content and works created by the site operator on these pages are subject to German copyright law. Duplication, processing, distribution, or any form of commercialization of such material beyond the scope of the copyright law shall require the prior written consent of its respective author or creator.
IMPRESSUM.PRIVACY_TEXT: Please also note our privacy policy regarding the handling of personal data.
